project_description: Awesome `{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}` is a Python cli/package created with https://gitlab.com/manoelpqueiroz/galactipy
author: Manoel Pereira de Queiroz

__prompts__.author: Author or Organisation

scm_platform.__prompt__: In which platform would you like to host your code?

licence.__prompt__: Which licence would you like to use for your project?
licence.GNU AGPL v3.0: GNU Affero General Public License version 3
licence.GNU LGPL v3.0: GNU Lesser General Public License version 3

__prompts__.use_formatters: Use Black, isort and pyupgrade for formatting?
__prompts__.use_linters: Use flake8 and pydocstyle for linting?
__prompts__.docstring_style: Which docstring style would you like to use? "numpy" and "google" styles will add pydoclint as a dependency.
__prompts__.create_example_template: Which example template would you like to create?

__scm_link_url: https://{{ cookiecutter.scm_platform }}.com/{{ cookiecutter.scm_username }}/{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}{% if cookiecutter.scm_platform == 'gitlab' %}/-{% endif %}
